content.prompt: The concerns about immigration expressed by Thatcher in the passage were most consistent with which of the following positions held by many British conservatives?

choices.label: Prioritizing good relations with the United States as the most important foreign policy goal
Resistance to full economic and political integration with Europe
Creation of a strong defensive capability to deter communist aggression
Skepticism about the value of the welfare state

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
